post.body: Scrapple will rise. Mark my words.
Oh, scrapple never left. The grey block never goes out of style.
So you enjoy that new DC vs MK combo?
Exactly! Sprint, T-Mobile, Verizon, Microsoft.. Everyone gets in on the foolishness.
Sprint tried to hit me with stuff like that back in the day.
No doubt. :)
One more 'scroll': Videogames: Again, The Root of all Evil: I don't feel the need to summarize.. http://tinyurl.com/8t553e
Hypertext fiction has caught my attention. Just makes me want to innovate with structure when I write.
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaand ok: http://twitter.com/KanyesBeard
Geico's commercials get stranger and stranger. And now they have a new version of a Rockwell song. Word? Somebody's watchin' meeeeeeeeeee...
http://twitpic.com/vsqd - Tis the season, truly.
I am diggin’ Air 'on the G string' by Johann Sebastian Bach . Savor it: http://bit.ly/5RWkR
I am diggin’ Gymnopedie No.1 by Erik Satie . Savor it: http://bit.ly/15De4
♥ Linus And Lucy by BÃ©la Fleck and the Flecktones http://bit.ly/9hRy

"Grayson". Still one of my favorites. http://tinyurl.com/222r8e
We're just in a hero mood around these parts. Here's that Superman Reborn trailer that cat made: http://tinyurl.com/7x3nxv
Also check out the guy's older Superman Reborn trailer.
Thundercats: The Movie (a fan made trailer with manipulations of Pitt, Jackman, and Diesal).. Brilliant. http://wormytv.blogspot.com/
